old:
お探しのものが出品されてると
いいですね
column2: It's good when the things you're looking for are already being offered for sale.
speaker: Mel

old:
バザーは品物との出会いと別れの場
あなたにとって不要になった品も
必要とする人は必ずいますよ
column2:
Bazaars are a place to meet and part with items.
Even if an item is no longer needed by you, there is always someone who needs it!
speaker: Mel

old:
私はただの出会いの仲介者
ほんの少しの手数料をいただくだけ
column2:
I am just a matchmaker for encounters, 
and I only charge a small handling fee
speaker: Mel

old:
いらっしゃいませ
本日の品揃えをご覧くださいな
column2: Welcome! Please have a look at today's selection.
speaker: Mel
